actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 741, the amendments to the resolution and preamble recommended by the Committee on Foreign Affairs printed in the resolution, modified by the amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-322 are considered to be adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 741, the amendments to the resolution and preamble recommended by the Committee on Foreign Affairs printed in the resolution, modified by the amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-322 are considered to be adopted.
